page.title: 13LIFE IN FOREST ROW
page.content: There is not a great deal to do in Forest Row.Life for the young is dull. On Monday night we have a Youth Club in the village hall. There is always some trouble between pupils from Sackville School and those from the Rudolf Steiner School.Gang fights do occur but they are not very nasty. Because there is nothing to do at night we roam the streets and this causes a lot of trouble between us and the old people. They say we are noisy and rowdy but I think that they are just miserable and grumpy.What we need in Forest Row is an all-night youth club. This would keep us off of the streets."The Old Swan Cafe" used to be open all-night but this shut years ago.
